channel.title: Comments on: Sharon Osbourne is not a QOTSA fan

item.title: By: Patti
item.dc:creator: Patti
item.description: obviously a cry for attention there, Sharon. If you can't handle someone's honesty then *of course* there's only one way to get your point across: "ME ANGRY! ME WANT DEAD!" like some fuckin' caveman...sarcasm noted there. Take it like a *civilized* being; there's a damn good reason Homme said what he did, and it's probably true considering he's not wishing anyone's dick to fall off. But hey, what's a non-celeb peon like me know? *chuckle* and personally i'd like Homme to live eternally. Like a vampire, but beyond better.
item.content:encoded: obviously a cry for attention there, Sharon. If you can’t handle someone’s honesty then *of course* there’s only one way to get your point across: “ME ANGRY! ME WANT DEAD!” like some fuckin’ caveman…sarcasm noted there. Take it like a *civilized* being; there’s a damn good reason Homme said what he did, and it’s probably true considering he’s not wishing anyone’s dick to fall off. But hey, what’s a non-celeb peon like me know? *chuckle* and personally i’d like Homme to live eternally. Like a vampire, but beyond better.

item.title: By: Ava
item.dc:creator: Ava
item.description:
I liked Sharon all right until I read that. everyone deseves to have thier level of comfort and expectation met as a performer its important. They are not cattle they are artists. I would never go to Ozzfest either.
Wish I could have made it to You guys w/ Foo earlier this month.
Josh, you hot bastard, you rock, you better not get syphillis, Brody would not like that. Not that I give a shit what she likes. Just jealous. Strappin Hottie. Lucky bitch.
item.content:encoded:
I liked Sharon all right until I read that. everyone deseves to have thier level of comfort and expectation met as a performer its important. They are not cattle they are artists. I would never go to Ozzfest either.

Josh, you hot bastard, you rock, you better not get syphillis, Brody would not like that. Not that I give a shit what she likes. Just jealous. Strappin Hottie. Lucky bitch.

item.title: By: chris robichaud
item.dc:creator: chris robichaud
item.description: haha that's fucken awesome, it's probably true fuck 'em. Tell that crippled sac of shit ozzy that the next hit he get's isn't gonna be acid,it'll be a boot in the fucken teeth if he don't fuck off, and ya this drug also causes brain damage.Hi feelin fucks,there family is a bunch of vegetable brained fucken retards ,in fact if they were not rich they'd probably die of starvation with a fridge full of food.....fucken useless osbournes,i'd rather watch the fucken fire hydrant in front of my house then those god damn hunks of shit......up yours osbourne, p.s go fuck yourselves 2 if u know how to do that,freaks
